programme.title: FBI S3 Ep12
programme.desc: Fathers And Sons - The team rushes to track down two doctors abducted by a desperate father willing to do anything to save his son. Also, Jubal's uncertainty in his family life affects his judgement during the hostage situation.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends 1 - The Young Ones Ep3
programme.desc: In this episode of Amazing Animal Friends a rescued orphaned rhino befriended by a playful dog and doting sheep, a big bunny rabbit that babysits boisterous baby lambs, and a porcupine that helps two English bulldogs rehabilitate injured animals.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 - City of Riches Ep1
programme.desc: Stake out the Bay Family’s lush territory, where matriarch Anna offers lavish feasts but faces internal dissent. Size up her rival Mia, the streetwise Townies leader who’s eyeing a lifestyle upgrade, and check in with the isolated Mangrove Family.

programme.title: Dogs with Extraordinary Jobs 1 - The Rescuers Ep1
programme.desc: Dogs around the world come to the rescue in surprising ways. Some search for survivors when disaster strikes or rescue animals from poachers and wildlife traffickers. Others help us in times of trouble—both on land and in the water.

programme.title: Dogs with Extraordinary Jobs 1 - The Lifesavers Ep2
programme.desc: Meet a border collie that protects aircraft from lethal bird strikes, a sprocker spaniel whose sense of smell is saving imperilled water voles, and an Anatolian shepherd that helps conserve Africa’s most endangered big cat, the cheetah.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 2 - The Devils of Even Tide Ep4
programme.desc: Ol Pejeta has a growing hyena population and staff must take the first-ever census of these very effective nocturnal hunters.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa 1 - Great Addo Elephant Ep1
programme.desc: The Addo Elephant National Park sits in the heart of the Eastern Cape of South Africa, covering over 1600 square kilometres of land. While the elephants are the stars of the park, Addo is the only reserve in the world where visitors can see all of the “big seven”: lion, leopard, elephant, buffalo, white rhino, southern right whale, and great white shark.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends 1 - A Friend in Need Ep2
programme.desc: Meet more Amazing Animal Friends including Charlotte, a schnauzer who enjoys bath time with her guinea pig pal Wallace, and a randy ram called Hamish who likes to sneak off to live with a herd of dairy cows instead of his own kind.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 - City of Riches Ep1
programme.desc: Stake out the Bay Family’s lush territory, where matriarch Anna offers lavish feasts but faces internal dissent. Size up her rival Mia, the streetwise Townies leader who’s eyeing a lifestyle upgrade, and check in with the isolated Mangrove Family.

programme.title: After the Wildfires
programme.desc: Charting the long-term recovery of wildlife in the aftermath of Australia’s catastrophic bushfires through stories of hope, human intervention and resilience, this film provides an urgent message to safeguard our environment before it is too late.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends 1 - The Young Ones Ep3
programme.desc: In this episode of Amazing Animal Friends a rescued orphaned rhino befriended by a playful dog and doting sheep, a big bunny rabbit that babysits boisterous baby lambs, and a porcupine that helps two English bulldogs rehabilitate injured animals.

programme.title: Secret Life of the Koala 1 - Koala Country Ep1
programme.desc: Despite being one of Australia’s best-known marsupials, koalas live only in the east and southeast parts of the continent. Learn how their lives and behaviors vary in these different regions.

programme.title: Secret Life of the Koala 1 - Breeding Season Ep2
programme.desc: Koalas may seem solitary and inert, but mating season brings a dramatic shift in their behavior, leading to movement, contact, and conflict. As breeding season begins, follow two large males on a mission to mate.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 2 - The Pendulum of Existence Ep5
programme.desc: Four North African white rhinos are settled at Ol Pejeta. The staff must prepare them for a return, not just to life in a semi-wild environment, but also to try and trigger their wild instincts – particularly their desire to breed.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends 1 - Born to Be Different Ep1
programme.desc: This episode of Amazing Animal Friends features a duck that won’t go in the water without a ride from her pooch pal, an elephant that thinks she’s a buffalo, and a herd of cows that adopt an orphaned deer.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends 1 - A Friend in Need Ep2
programme.desc: Meet more Amazing Animal Friends including Charlotte, a schnauzer who enjoys bath time with her guinea pig pal Wallace, and a randy ram called Hamish who likes to sneak off to live with a herd of dairy cows instead of his own kind.

programme.title: Dogs with Extraordinary Jobs 1 - The Lifesavers Ep2
programme.desc: Meet a border collie that protects aircraft from lethal bird strikes, a sprocker spaniel whose sense of smell is saving imperilled water voles, and an Anatolian shepherd that helps conserve Africa’s most endangered big cat, the cheetah.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 - Foxes Ep1
programme.desc: Wild Wild East travels to Prince Edward Island to explore the family life of the Red Fox. These sly creatures are adept at living just on the fringes of the human world.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 - Rivers Ep2
programme.desc: Wild Wild East swims in the Rivers of Nova Scotia. Two species of fish, the Shad and the Gaspereau swim upstream to their ancestral spawning grounds, while a colony of Double-Crested Cormorants thrive on the mouth of the Pictou River.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa 1 - Great Karoo Ep4
programme.desc: In the center of South Africa is an ancient landscape that was once an inland sea. Now it’s a mosaic of unique habitats. Life here has evolved ingenious solutions to survive. There is nowhere in South Africa quite like the Karoo National Park.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa 1 - Kgalagadi Transfrontier Park Ep5
programme.desc: In the southern reaches of Africa’s great Kalahari basin, everything is made tough. Ancient rivers harbor water deep underground, and these hidden lifelines forge a fragile link to survival. This is the Kgalagadi Transfrontier Park.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa 1 - Chobe National Park: Land of Learning Ep6
programme.desc: In the north of Botswana there is a haven where the Chobe River provides a lifeline for wildlife, but in the dry season many animals face a daily battle with the fierce heat, Including three of Africa’s most iconic families: lions, elephants and baboons. Though they may be vastly different, they all have the same goal: to raise their young.

programme.title: Africa's Hidden Kingdoms 1 - Namaqualand: the Desert Bloom Ep4
programme.desc: For most of the year it’s a desert, but during early August and September the dusty valleys of Namaqualand transform into a wonderland carpeted with wildflowers. Witness this magnificent transformation from arid desert to beautiful oasis.

programme.title: Into the Wild Colombia 1 - A Capuchin’s Tale Ep1
programme.desc: Growing up in the rainforests in the heart of Colombia, a young capuchin monkey has to master his climbing skills, learn how to find food and learn to distinguish friend from foe.

programme.title: Into the Wild Colombia 1 - The Hummingbird’s Quest Ep2
programme.desc: From Colombia’s high plains of the Páramo to its tropical forests, hummingbirds have evolved into an extraordinary number of species. Whether battling freezing rain or jungle predators, each mother must struggle to build a nest, protect her eggs.

programme.title: Into the Wild Colombia 1 - Warriors of the Llanos Ep3
programme.desc: The flat savannas of the Colombian Llanos are governed by seasonal extremes that push life to the brink. In this unforgiving arena, there are no second chances, and only creatures best adapted to their brutal extremes will make it through a year.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 - July-August - a Time of Migration Ep4
programme.desc: Witness some of the planet’s most dramatic natural shifts in July, from the Arctic ice sheets that come crashing down during the summer melt to the feeding frenzy when sockeye salmon reach the end of their journey in Alaska.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 - September-October - a Time of Activation Ep5
programme.desc: Travel around the world to see another seasonal change unfold. The Northern Hemisphere moves into autumn, while Australia witnesses a rebirth of life, and mating humpbacks fill the warming tropical seas of Tonga.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 - November-December - Full Circle Ep6
programme.desc: Witness some of the most incredible natural events in November, from the millions of Monarch butterflies that converge in Mexico’s forests to the deep fog that shrouds the city of Dubai, signalling the start of winter.

programme.title: Arctic Secrets 2 - Rhythm of the Bay Ep1
programme.desc: The Hudson Bay lowlands are part of North America’s largest wetland. Over 300,000 square kilometers of muskeg, a vast bogland as far as the eye can see characterized by water soaked peat, mosses and stunted trees. Once thought of as barren wasteland, it is now understood that these bogs are crucially important to life on earth. Globally, there is as much carbon dioxide held in wetlands as there is in the atmosphere. The peatland ecosystem is the most efficient carbon sink on the planet.

programme.title: Arctic Secrets 2 - Yukon Wild Ep2
programme.desc: The Yukon is a true wilderness, one of the last on Earth. The vast land got its name from its longest river, which the Gwich’in, one of the indigenous people of the region, call "Yu-kun- ah", or, the "great river". The third longest waterway in North America, the Yukon River flows through wide open valleys and narrow channels over 3,000 km Northwest towards the storm tossed Bering Sea.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 - Skies Ep3
programme.desc: Take to the sky to soar with the Bald Eagle. From Cape Breton’s Bras d’Or Lake, to the bird’s overwintering home in the Annapolis Valley, the Eagle’s raise families, hunt and forage for food, and compete for territory with another bird of prey, the Osprey.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 - Tides Ep4
programme.desc: Follow the ebb and flow of the tides. Over a hundred thousand sandpipers migrating from the Arctic to South America make a pit stop along the Bay of Fundy. On the other side of Nova Scotia, the rocky-coastline provides a home for harbor and grey seals.

programme.title: Wildest New Zealand 1 - Ocean Legacy Ep4
programme.desc: Spring on New Zealand’s east coast is a time of promise for the New Zealand Fur Seal and the Norther Royal Albatross. They’ve returned to their land to breed. But harsh terrain, fickle weather and hungry predators will conspire to make lives difficult for them. Only the strongest will survive to carry forward their legacy.

programme.title: Arctic Secrets 1 - Wild Seas Ep5
programme.desc: On the north-east coast of Baffin Island, in Canada’s Arctic, lies Ninginganiq, a blustery wilderness where only the intrepid travel. In fall, it is so dangerous that even seasoned Inuit sailors keep away.

programme.desc: Stalk the seas with sharks as they hunt using heightened senses and killer instincts. Watch a whitetip reef shark put its electrical sensors to work finding its prey’s heartbeat, and the pelagic thresher shark stun its quarry with its whiplike tail.

programme.title: Planet Shark 1 - Ocean Voyagers Ep2
programme.desc: Navigate the ocean’s vast distances, depths, and darkness with nomadic sharks that thrive in the blue emptiness. Meet a lone blue shark traversing stormy Atlantic seas, and hundreds of hammerheads returning to their Pacific island breeding ground.

programme.title: Untamed Valley 1 - The Big Bend Ep2
programme.desc: The Big Bend is over two miles long… one of the biggest meanders along the Luangwa River in Zambia. It’s a busy spot - home to a pod of hippos who luxuriate in its deep pools, an important crossing point for elephants and place to drink for huge herds of buffalo.

programme.title: Untamed Valley 1 - Ebony Plain Ep3
programme.desc: Bustling with wildlife, a grassland lies at the heart of Zambia’s Luangwa Valley known to locals as "The Ebony Plain". It’s a busy little neighborhood - home to a family of warthogs, a troop of baboons and a solitary female leopard named Olimba. Watch as life and death unfold on a daily basis in this corner of the Zambian wilds.

programme.desc: It's the semi-final and the junior bakers tackle a cute-but-tough Technical, and one of the hardest French patisserie skills with a Junior Bake Off twist: 3D choux centrepieces.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA (S10) Ep8
programme.desc: Bowlero - Colie Edison, chief customer officer of Bowlero Corp and CEO of the Professional Bowlers Association, works to spare the customers from waiting too long when checking them in to bowl, and tries for a perfect game while taking food orders as a lane server.

programme.title: Hungry For It (S1) Ep6
programme.desc: It's fast food week, and, with a place in the semi-final at stake, the final five cooks level up instant noodles and attempt to bash out Mexican fast food in just 90 seconds.

programme.title: Bang On Budget (S1) Ep10
programme.desc: Yiannadji - Mary and Andy have fallen for a white high-gloss kitchen but the look that they like is way out of their budget. Can Lucy and Harry help?

programme.title: Rachel Khoo's Kitchen Notebook: Melbourne (S1) Ep8
programme.desc: Rachel wraps up her Melbourne immersion with a look into the city's current and future food trends. She meets a Thai couple that have crafted a passion for Asian fusion food with a unique all day breakfast menu.

programme.title: Extraordinary Places to Eat (S2) Ep1
programme.desc: Marrakesh - TV chef Andi Oliver takes Fred to Marrakesh to enjoy lamb and couscous at a legendary restaurant, chicken tagine for under £10 and breakfast on a spectacular roof terrace.

programme.title: Junior Bake Off (S6) Ep15
programme.desc: It's the final, and the four remaining bakers create a themed afternoon tea, with entremets and pastries, and a showstopping tiered layer cake. Who will be crowned the winner?

programme.title: My Unique B&B (S2) Ep1
programme.desc: Liam and Hannah's Shepherd's Hut - Situated in a water meadow in north Dorset, rare breed farmers Liam and Hannah's 1930s shepherd's hut was bought for just £5 almost 40 years ago. Simon and the team help them to restore it.

programme.title: My Unique B&B (S2) Ep2
programme.desc: Faith's Geodome - Simon and the team go to Devon where camp site owner Faith wants to create a unique property using an invention of her late father's. Faith wants the B&B's rooms to have a celestial theme.

programme.title: Gordon, Gino and Fred's Road Trip (S1) Ep2
programme.desc: French Connection - Gordon, Gino and Fred travel to France, where Fred has been asked to co-host an Oyster Festival in the beautiful Arcachon Bay, in just four days' time.

programme.title: Alaskan Killer Bigfoot S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Nantinaqs Exorcism - Paranormal investigators perform a powerful cleansing ceremony to rid the village of its demonic energy. Will they be able to banish Nantinaq from Portlock?

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On Ep21
programme.desc: Weekend At Diamonds / Brancheption - Guy creates a new invention, the Farty Party/When Branch is trapped in a dream by a mysterious critter called the Dream Sucker, he must find a way to escape

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On Ep22
programme.desc: The Bunker List / The Interns - Branch bets Guy and Smidge that he can complete his Bunker List in one day/Satin and Chenille get the chance to intern for their idol Nova Swift

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep22
programme.desc: Baby Face Off/The Pursuit Of Wrinkliness - Thunk babysits Sandy and new baby Cliff to prove his responsible. Cliff is a jerk and keeps getting Sandy in trouble/Gran worries that Thunk isn't tough enough to survive to adulthood because he likes to hang out with old people, so she puts him through a series of toughness tests.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep23
programme.desc: Croodtopia/Hand On A Hard Egg - When the adults come down with the sneezles, the kids (including Lerk and Womp) use the chance to create their own society ("you-topia") with no rules, but Eep and Thunk disagree on how to run it/Food is scarce and when a large egg is spotted on the hunting field, Grug, Eep, Snoot, Munk and Squawk call dibbs. It's decided that whoever is tough enough to be the last holding on, wins the food.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep47
programme.desc: Titan Up - When the Orphans start rumors that Puss has special powers, Taranis the God of Thunder asks Puss to help defeat the most powerful God of all, Toutatis

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep48
programme.desc: Boar Games - When Roz the boar comes to San Lorenzo to collect a bounty for capturing Puss, Pajuna tries to keep them separated before an epic fight breaks out

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep47
programme.desc: Gold Rush - Hiccup and the Riders, with help from Dagur hatch a plan to steal Berk's gold back.

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep48
programme.desc: Out Of The Frying Pan - When the Eruptodon can't take its egg into the Great Volcano, Hiccup and Fishlegs must go into the dangerous volcano with the egg before it's too late.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep21
programme.desc: Packet Racket / Smack Me Down - When a shady group of bugs moves into the city selling artificial ketchup, Turbo and Shadow go undercover to expose who is behind the operation. // After Turbo is challenged to compete in an underground smack-talk contest, he must get lessons from the best insult snail there is, Burn.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep22
programme.desc: Smoovin On Up / The Great Shell Robbery - Smoove Move goes from underground street artist to world-famous pedicurist and lets his newfound fame go to his head. // Thieving hermit crabs steal the crew's shells, so they concoct an elaborate heist to get them back.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep73
programme.desc: Blackboard Jungle - King Julien organizes an Academic Bowl to prove the lemurs are the smartest on the island

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep74
programme.desc: Lord Of The Fruit Flies - King Julien tries to rig an election so that Maurice becomes Mango Prime Minister but soon realizes his opponent Mort has a better shot than everyone thinks

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep75
programme.desc: Karl-Mageddon - In honor of his retirement, Karl hosts an elaborate contest to find his successor – who will become Madagascar’s next super villain

programme.desc: Weekend At Diamonds / Brancheption - Guy creates a new invention, the Farty Party/When Branch is trapped in a dream by a mysterious critter called the Dream Sucker, he must find a way to escape

programme.desc: Titan Up - When the Orphans start rumors that Puss has special powers, Taranis the God of Thunder asks Puss to help defeat the most powerful God of all, Toutatis

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep48
programme.desc: Boar Games - When Roz the boar comes to San Lorenzo to collect a bounty for capturing Puss, Pajuna tries to keep them separated before an epic fight breaks out

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep47
programme.desc: Gold Rush - Hiccup and the Riders, with help from Dagur hatch a plan to steal Berk's gold back.

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep48
programme.desc: Out Of The Frying Pan - When the Eruptodon can't take its egg into the Great Volcano, Hiccup and Fishlegs must go into the dangerous volcano with the egg before it's too late.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep29
programme.desc: Rupert And The Dancing Shoes - Raggety wants new shoes but can't afford them so Ping Pong tries to jazz up the ones he's wearing but her spell goes wrong and the shoes dance off with Raggety inside them and unable to stop. Will Rupert and Ping Pong be able to stop Raggety in time before the shoes carry him one step too far, into danger?

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep30
programme.desc: Rupert And The Oldest Tree - Rupert is on a hunt for leaves to fill his new wall chart. He meets Raggety who offers to help him find a strange star-shaped leaf from a magical tree – the oldest tree in Nutwood. The Fox Twins don't think much of leaf hunting. They overhear Rupert's plans and decide to play a trick on Rupert and Raggety. But their trick backfires when Raggety does some elf magic and Freddie vanishes into thin air. How will Rupert and Raggety find Freddie and get him back to Freda? And what of their search for the oldest tree in the forest?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep29
programme.desc: Hide And Toot - The animals are playing hide and seek. Huffty gets upset when his trunk keeps giving him away. Can Raa Raa and his friends show the little elephant that his trunk is really rather wonderful?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep30
programme.desc: Boing Boing - Raa Raa has got a new pogo stick. He is having a great time bouncing around, but his friends aren't so sure… he seems to be causing rather a lot of damage. Is there any way Raa Raa can practise without destroying their jungle home?

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep3
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Flying Shark - Julian is very excited about the Sealife Awareness Day at Greendale School. While he's talking to Pat about it, his dad gets a call from Ben - a special delivery! Pat discovers it's a giant inflatable shark which is to be the surprise centrepiece of the Sealife day. But when Pat stops to help Alf mend a gate, a mix-up with parcel tape ends up with the whale accidentally inflating and floating off... Pat must use his ingenuity to catch the whale and - most important of all - deliver it in time for the special Sealife Awareness event...

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep4
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Blue Flash - Pat must deliver Ben to Greendale School, dressed as superhero, The Blue Flash. But Ben keeps stopping to help people on the way and his costume gets increasingly ruined! Meanwhile at the school, Julian can't wait to meet his hero but Sarah Gilbertson insists that The Blue Flash isn't real... At last Pat arrives at the school with Ben wearing a new costume hastily cobbled together by Pat. Julian isn't fooled. Looks like The Blue Flash isn't real after all... But then Pat tells the kids how Ben helped people on the way and they realise he is a REAL superhero!

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep81
programme.desc: Runaway Mo - Stingo is bored, he wants something exciting to do. He decides to take Mo for a spin without asking Fifi first. All goes wrong when Mo gets out of control. Can the tots stop the runaway mower?

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep82
programme.desc: Stingo'S Enormous Carrot - Pip is trying hard to grow some vegetables. But however hard he tries, they don't seem to get any bigger. But Stingo's vegetable patch next door appears to be doing suspiciously well.

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep29
programme.desc: Dennis Tv - Walter launches his own mega-dull, yet hypnotic TV channel with an antenna booster that swamps all other transmissions! Rubi helps Dennis set up his own station with a more powerful booster, and the ensuing battle between Walter and Dennis begins! Who will grab the ratings?!

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep30
programme.desc: The Dog Ate It, Miss - The Dog Ate It, Miss Gnasher gulps down Dennis' permission slip for the school trip! There's only one thing for it – they need Prof Von Screwtop to use his shrink ray to shrink them down to bite size humans so they can travel on a sausage into Gnasher tummy and retrieve the slip! Easy! It would be if it wasn't for the Alien Empress Miasma!

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep41
programme.desc: Blood Duel - When Zarkon demands a tradeoff, the team has a difference of opinion on what to do; Meanwhile, Haggarobsesses over the past

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle Ep15
programme.desc: Almost Famoose: Chapter Two - A video of Rocky and Bullwinkle playing a song goes viral and they’re rocketed to musical superstardom. They decide to use their newfound celebrity to launch a “save the birdbath” concert tour to restore the giant birdbath they destroyed.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep15
programme.desc: No Can Do / Adopt-A-Toad - Chet is determined to open a giant can of tomato juice lands in town and Turbo worries that Chet is becoming obsessed with the can. // Turbo donates his race winnings an animal charity, but accidentally adopts a toad who moves into the clubhouse and becomes an obnoxious house guest.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep12
programme.desc: Ottos - When a meteor crashes into the Wrenchtools' home, the Dinotrux take them to safe ground; little do they know D-Structs is planning a giant attack.

programme.title: Where'S Wally? Ep12
programme.desc: Venice The Menace - The Wanderers head to Venice to get a new cookie jar from Venice. Odlulu aims to become belle of the ball at the Venice Carnival but when she gets hold of the Crystal Glass Key, she turns the canals of Venice to glass. The Wanderers must get the key back and restore the city to normal.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free - Riding Academy Ep67
programme.desc: Back To The Starting Line - As a new term begins, Maricela and her horse, Mystery, arrive at the academy to join Lucky, Pru and Abigail for the school year.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On Ep12
programme.desc: The Party Games / Trolly Tales - Everyone gets excited because its time for the Trolls Annual funbased Party GamesPoppy and Branch try to convince the Troll kids that the library is fun.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien: Exiled Ep64
programme.desc: The Day After Yesterday - King Julien's attempts to destroy Koto were unsuccessful but the allies he's formed all come to help out, and Koto's wedding turns into all-out battle

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep12
programme.desc: Sitting On Babies / Best Frenemies - Things go very wrong when Tip and Oh watch the Gorg babies at a cheese-themed playland/Captain Smek pretends to be Oh's friend just to ruin his day.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep38
programme.desc: Parrot Booty - When Puss and the pirates find the treasure of San Luis Rey, they must find a way to escape the attack of Bonky the Parrot and his skeleton army.

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep38
programme.desc: Last Auction Heroes - When the Riders uncover the location of Viggo's Dragon Auction, they must stop him from selling dragons and stealing all the gold in Berk.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep13
programme.desc: Unsolved Mystereep - When Gran's cane and Sandy's bear go missing in the middle of the night, Eep chases down every clue to the first-ever mystery to find the thief.

programme.desc: Chet Vs Dr. Disorder / Damselfly In Distress - Chet becomes obsessed with tracking down a litterbug who is messing up the clean streets of Turbotown. // The FAST crew must compete against each other as they run a dangerous obstacle course race to save a damselfly princess who is being held captive.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep24
programme.desc: Dome Sweet Dome / My Pet Clamsquatch - Chet accidentally trades all of the town's tomatoes to the devious Ace Gecko and the FAST crew has to outsmart the lizard in order to get them back. // Skidmark has been secretly keeping a clamsquatch as a pet and it's up to the crew to protect the creature from a nefarious secret organization.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep31
programme.desc: Rupert And The Clockwork Dragon - Ming is hurt when Rupert and friends appear to prefer Bill's new toy dragon to her. But when the toy gets them lost in the woods they discover there are some things that only a real dragon can do.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep32
programme.desc: Rupert And The Moon Adventure - With the sun low in the sky, Rupert waves to Ping Pong, Bill, Edward and Ming as they join him at his cottage. They are all going to stay up late to see something very special – an eclipse of the moon. Bill is just explaining what an eclipse is when Raggety arrives. In his impatience, he does not want to wait for the moon to rise. He wants to see it straight away. Raggety does elf magic to see the moon at once but promptly vanishes. The others think he is playing a trick and hiding from them, but when Bill looks through the telescope, keen to see the start of the eclipse he gets a shock. Raggety has got his wish to see the moon. His magic has taken him there! How will Rupert and friends get him back down before the eclipse shrinks the moon down to nothing? It is a race against time to save their little elf friend.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep31
programme.desc: Catch Me If You Can - All the animals are having a nap. But Raa Raa and Ooo Ooo aren't tired and want to play… will they have enough energy to last until everyone else wakes up?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep32
programme.desc: Raa Raa'S Whistle Worries - Raa Raa is determined that he can copy all the noises in the Jingly Jangly Jungle… until he hears Topsy whistling. Try as he might, Raa Raa just can't whistle. All his jungle friends help Raa Raa to learn to whistle.

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep5
programme.desc: Postman Pat’S Pancake Party - Pat must deliver eggs, milk, flour and butter to Greendale for the annual Pancake Race. But when Michael mixes all the ingredients together, Pat finds that he instead has to deal with a mixing bowl full to the brim with pancake mix... Meanwhile in Greendale, Sara's attempts at pancake-tossing aren't going well and she soon loses her pancake under the wheels of PC Selby's car. Even worse, Ted Glen's amazing Pancake Machine has run out of mix so Sara won't be able to run the race unless Pat can get to Greendale on time... But Pat gets waylaid by Alf's cows and the pancake mix ends up all over the road. Pat hurries back to Pencaster but Michael now only has butter and flour so Pat has to go and get eggs from Nisha and even some milk from Rosie the goat! With the race about to start, Pat arrives just in time with all the ingredients necessary for Ted to make Sara a fresh pancake. SDS Mission accomplished!

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep6
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Runaway Remote - Pat doesn't realise today's Special Delivery, a super all-in-one remote control, is quite as powerful as it is! As Jess falls asleep on the buttons, machines all around Pencaster start going haywire. Waiting for the remote, Charlie and Julian are installing a futuristic 'Shop a Bot 3000' robot sales assistant for Mrs Goggins, but they make the mistake of turning it on before the controller arrives. Pat struggles to make his delivery before the shop robot does too much damage!

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep83
programme.desc: Fifi'S Pancake Fun - Fifi and Pip are busy making pancakes. But every time they flip one it disappears, where could they be going?

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep84
programme.desc: Pip'S Pony - Pip wants a pony. He tries adapting his scooter and Violet even makes him a hobby horse. But nothing is quite right. Until Fifi points out the silver horse made out of stars in the night sky.

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep31
programme.desc: The Fangtom Menace - Pieface's first sleepover in the Den is troubled by spooky tales of a frightening Fangtom AND Walter with a demolition gang determined to flatten the Den!

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep32
programme.desc: Gnashernal Treasure - The class dig up a mysterious time capsule which sends them into a frenzy to find the hidden treasure before Walter or a greed-crazed Paul the Potato can thwart them.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep117
programme.desc: The Great Skate Case - When Vola's skatefish board goes missing before a big event, Detective Baby Shark and William Watson are on the case.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep905
programme.desc: Pups Save a Humdinger Doll / Pups Save a Sand Sculpture Contest - With Tracker's help, the PAW Patrol must rescue Mayor Humdinger who has been mistaken for Big Hairy's missing toy doll. // When Mayor Humdinger tries to cheat at the Adventure Bay sand sculpture contest, his machine goes out-of-control.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Paddington and the Wardrobe / Paddington Helps with Homework - Paddington is accidentally delivered inside a wardrobe to Mr. Curry's house and must get out before he is discovered. // Paddington tries to help Judy with her geography homework and ends up being the subject of it.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep624
programme.desc: The Fish Pond - Daddy Pig takes Peppa and George to see a fish pond he used to visit when he was a little piggy. He is a little surprised to learn that a few things have changed since then.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep625
programme.desc: The Olden Days - Mummy Pig shows Peppa and her friend Suzy Sheep old photographs from when they were babies. Peppa and Suzy don't remember being that young but are pleased to see that they've always been best friends.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep626
programme.desc: Snowy Mountain - Peppa and her friends are on Snowy Mountain learning how to ski. Their teacher, Madame Gazelle is very good at skiing and was once a world champion! But in the end it is Mummy Pig who impresses everyone...

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep143
programme.desc: The Surprise - They decide to organise a surprise party on the hill. The organisation gets out of hand when Bubu's invitation cards fly away, Ron gets distracted in writing a heartfelt poem and Christopher tries to resist to eat the strawberry pie he baked

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep144
programme.desc: The Paperplane Race - Everyone is bored today, so Bubu organises a paper plane race! Anna, Froga, Ron and Bubu need to create their own special paper planes. To everyone surprise, Froga and Bubu are still in the race.... Who will win?

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep308
programme.desc: Blue's Backyard Sports Spectacular - It's a Backyard Sports Spectacular! Coach Josh and friends are playing all the sports and getting ready for a soccer game! But Magenta isn't ready for the big game. We play Blue's Clues to figure out how we can help Magenta feel ready to play!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep807
programme.desc: Pups Save The Hiding Elephants / Pups Save a Yodeler - Elephants become trapped in the Monkey Temple after a bee frightens them away from their watering hole. // When Wingnut runs away from wolves that are attracted to his yodeling, he ends up trapped in a canyon. The Paw Patrol has to hurry to save him.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep610
programme.desc: Pups Save Breakfast - Mr. Porter and Alex are in a sticky situation - they're up to their ears in maple syrup! It's up to the PAW Patrol to save the Porter's and Breakfast!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Captain Kelp / Teensy the Tardigrade - As Super Shark and Captain Kelp, Baby Shark and William set out to save playtime-but is Captain Kelp just a sidekick? // Baby Shark adopts a teensy tiny pet, but is he ready for a big responsibility?

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep206
programme.desc: Satellite flight / Diamond geezer - Everyone is grooving to Stu and Safia's dance song, so the Deer has to stop Steel's satellite from broadcasting hypnotic dance signals.// To impress Lady Fluffpot, Sir Steel tries to get his hands on Jade's precious Rainbow Diamond!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep226
programme.desc: Paddington Loves Windsor Gardens / Paddington Helps a Hedgehog - Paddington & the Kids overhear Mr. Brown talking about selling the house! Will they really have to leave Windsor Gardens? // The kids are playing in the garden & make a prickly discovery. Something is not right so Paddington asks Baaz to help.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Paddington And Poor Mr Curry - Mr. Curry is ill and Paddington decides to nurse him back to health with his own recipe for onion soup.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep624
programme.desc: Superwheels! - Blaze super powers transforming him into... SUPER BLAZE!! And just in time; trouble Bots from outer space land in Axle City and start making a huge mess!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S04 Ep401
programme.desc: Robot Power - When Crusher unleashes three of his most destructive creations on Axle City, there's only one hero strong enough to save the day: Robot Blaze!

programme.desc: Princess and the Pirate Puppy / Caracol Cove - Santi and crew will have to team up with a pirate puppy to stop Bonnie Bones and save an old friend. // Enrique's new gold-digging machine threatens Lorelai's home.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Captain Kelp - As Super Shark and Captain Kelp, Baby Shark and William set out to save playtime-but is Captain Kelp just a sidekick?

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep603
programme.desc: A Giant Harvest Day! - Holiday Cooks Molly and Gil, on a mission to save the town's Harvest Day (Thanksgiving) feast, must retrieve a Golden Tomato from magical Tall Tale Farms. But first, their food knowledge is tested by three guardians!

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep604
programme.desc: The SS Friendship! - Captain Deemo (Deema) and First Mate Gil pilot their steampunk sub to different ocean habitats so they can deliver Friendship Day Bubblegrams to all their friends. But along the way, they find themselves being chased by a Kraken!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep302
programme.desc: The Rainbow - Peppa and her family spot a rainbow when they go for a drive.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep303
programme.desc: Pedro's Cough - Pedro gets a contagious cough at daycare and other children soon catch it. When it's time to go the grown-ups catch it too, including Madame Gazelle. Doctor Brown Bear gives them terrible-tasting medicine, but who will look after him when he is sick?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep523
programme.desc: The Noisy Night - Peppa's family is staying at Cousin Chloe's house. It's been a long day and everyone is sleepy. But baby Alexander keeps everyone awake with his crying!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep524
programme.desc: The Wishing Well - Granny Pig is really pleased with all the plastic gnomes and the wishing well she's got for the garden, but Grandpa Pig wishes they would all disappear!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep151
programme.desc: The Amazing Guesser - After performing a backyard magic show with Ron, Christopher convinces himself that he actually has magical guessing powers! Christopher utilizes the help of Bubu and Ron to surprise the surprisers when they wake up!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep152
programme.desc: The Robot Player - Christopher has organized several games in the CLEARING for his friends to play. And the prize for each will be a TROPHY! The friends are super excited when Bubu brings his robot to play along with the group.

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep114
programme.desc: Going into the Wild - The Barbapapas are off to a new adventure... in the garden. But living in nature is more complicated than they expected.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep120
programme.desc: Relay Tales / The Barbababies' World - Barbalib, Barbalala and Barbabelle take turns as narrators to tell a story, each one bringing a very personal touch to it. // The Barbapapa family spends a day at the beach. Divided into 2 teams, the barbababies fight over a sandy peninsula.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S02 Ep201
programme.desc: Blue's Big Beat Band - Josh and Blue are starting a band! As we play Blue's Clues to find out what instrument Blue will play, we form our very own house band, learn rhythms, identify tempos, and sing, tap, and clap all day long.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep624
programme.desc: Superwheels! - Blaze super powers transforming him into... SUPER BLAZE!! And just in time; trouble Bots from outer space land in Axle City and start making a huge mess!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep316
programme.desc: Pups Bear-ly Save Danny / Pups Save the Mayor's Tulips - Daring Danny X is at it again! This time he’s stuck in a tree over a deep canyon and is pursued by hungry bears. // Mayor Humdinger sabotages Mayor Goodway’s perfect petals for the tulip contest. Chase and Rocky to the rescue!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep317
programme.desc: All Star Pups! / Pups Save Sports Day - It’s monkey mayhem as pups play kickball against Raimondo’s team, until an eagle steals the ball. // The All Star Pups are ready to compete in the summer sports day when Daring Danny X turns the field into an ice rink!

programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Donut Panic / I Scream - Rammy's tips on focus and meditation come in handy when Sir Steel's Replicator causes havoc in the Central Forest with giant donuts. // When Kai overexerts his Water Power on an ice cream machine, the machine turns into a rampaging Ice-Bot!

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep202
programme.desc: Muffin in space - Sir Steel catapults all his old junk into space - but suddenly realises Muffin is in there too! He needs Deer Squad's help to bring her home.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Paddington Plans a Party / Paddington Learns the Violin - Mr Brown has forgotten to get Mrs Brown a Birthday present, Paddington decides to hold a surprise party. // Judy does not like Violin lessons so hides from Ms Potts. Paddington takes up the challenge. Watch out ears!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep509
programme.desc: The Rainy Day Game - Daddy teaches Peppa and George a fun game to play while they wait inside for the rain to stop.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep510
programme.desc: Mummy Rabbit's Bump - Everyone is excited when Mummy Rabbit arrives with some big news-she is pregnant! Will it be one baby or twins?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep511
programme.desc: Pedro the Cowboy - Pedro Pony pretends he is a proper cowboy, telling everyone stories in the camp he has set up in the garden.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep512
programme.desc: Peppa and George's Garden - Grandpa Pig pops round with some seeds for Peppa and George. Daddy Pig helps out by being a scarecrow

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep609
programme.desc: The Jaw-some Sharkventure! - Zooli and her crew of Marine Biologists escort their new friends Baby Shark and his pilot fish William to visit Baby Shark's great-great-great-great-great Uncle Slow Mo, and help them escape the determined fisherman who's chasing them!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S01 Ep105
programme.desc: ABC's with Blue - We are reading Blue's Clues to figure out what book Blue wants to read for story time. While looking for clues we practice letter recognition and sound, help Mr. Salt & Mrs. Pepper with their grocery list and skidoo into a book!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S01 Ep106
programme.desc: 123's with Blue - Count along with Josh & Blue in this game of Blue's Clues to find out what Blue wants to buy at the store. We help Shovel & Pail learn who has more graham crackers then help Josh discover what he can buy with his Blue dollars.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S05 Ep512
programme.desc: The Mechanic Team! - Blaze stops into Gabby's Garage for a quick repair - just as she gets an alert! Three far-flung trucks need her mechanical know-how! So, Blaze and AJ volunteer to help her take her garage on the go!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Lorelai's Bracelet / Cecelia And The Ghost Ship - Bonnie steals Lorelai's bracelet, turning herself into a mermaid and while trapping Lorelai in human form! // Santi and crew must overcome ghostly shenanigans to save Cecilia from the dreaded Ghost Ship

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep117
programme.desc: The Great Skate Case - When Vola's skatefish board goes missing before a big event, Detective Baby Shark and William Watson are on the case.

programme.desc: Pups Save a Humdinger Doll / Pups Save a Sand Sculpture Contest - With Tracker's help, the PAW Patrol must rescue Mayor Humdinger who has been mistaken for Big Hairy's missing toy doll. // When Mayor Humdinger tries to cheat at the Adventure Bay sand sculpture contest, his machine goes out-of-control.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep522
programme.desc: Spider's Web - Ew! There's a spider in the house! Mummy Pig tells Daddy Pig to get rid of it.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep301
programme.desc: Work and Play - When Peppa and Suzy learn that grown ups must work all day, they decide to play at working in a store. But they quickly get tired of it.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep302
programme.desc: The Rainbow - Peppa and her family spot a rainbow when they go for a drive.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep145
programme.desc: Give-Away Day - Froga gets a new beautiful Sunflower Plant and decides to put it in her greenhouse. But she realizes that has been using her greenhouse to store all the items she doesn't know what to do with anymore. Now there's no room for her plant!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep146
programme.desc: Funny Sounds - When he accidentally erases the 3 funny sounds that Christopher had on his recorder, Ron, decides to re-record them with the help of all his friends. But no sound seem to suit Christopher, who has a hard time accepting the loss of them.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Double Dare You / Roy - On a ski trip, the Barbapapas build a giant igloo. Barbabravo and Barbalib challenge each other to find out who is braver. // Barbabright creates a vacuuming robot that's also very good at soccer. The Barbababies organise a match against the robots.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep309
programme.desc: Mailtime Mystery - It's a busy delivery day for Mailbox and there's a special letter that needs to be delivered, but he doesn't know who it is for! We play Blue's Clues to figure out who the letter is for.

programme.title: Dora the Explorer S03 Ep327
programme.desc: Dora's Pirate Adventure - Dora and friends are about to put on a pirate play when the Pirate Piggies steal their treasure chest and costumes.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep207
programme.desc: Jump up & get down / What's up Lola - It's Deer Squad to the rescue when Stu and Safia bounce off to space on their super bouncy mega trampolines./ A bad mood crystal causes Lola and many animals to become unusually grumpy!Jade has to help Deer Squad to restore joy around Central Forest.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep203
programme.desc: Paddington Clowns Around / Paddington and The Bad Swap - Paddington throws a Birthday party for Mateo but things don't go to plan, will Mrs. Brown's clown act save the day? // Paddington accidentally gives away Jonathan's rare Tiny Robot card in a game of Imaginarium. How will he get it back?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep204
programme.desc: Paddington Celebrates Mrs Birds Day / Paddington The Table Tennis Champ! - It's Mrs. Bird Day & Paddington wants to make a cake with a Special jar of Marmalade but no one can open it - how will he show his appreciation? // Paddington & Mateo form a table tennis team and the beat the table hogs so everyone can play!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S04 Ep402
programme.desc: The Pickle Family Campout - When all the members of Pickle's family get lost in the woods, Pickle teams up with Tow Truck Blaze to come to their rescue!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S04 Ep403
programme.desc: The Chicken Circus! - Blaze, AJ, and Darington are in the front row for the amazing Chicken Circus! But when Crusher accidentally launches the chickens far, far away, it's up to Blaze and Darington to get their feathered friends back to the big top!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep106
programme.desc: The Night of the Turtles / Santiago's Regatta - When Bonnie kidnaps newly-hatched turtles before they can swim to momma out at sea, Santi and crew are on the move. // Santi and crew struggle to win the Isla Encanto Regatta when Enrique starts to cheat.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Shadowland - Jealous of Baby Shark's popularity, Shadow rebrands the Wreck as his own personal amusement park.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep605
programme.desc: The Holiday Parties! - In Holiday Land, there's a town for every holiday...that is, until Pirate Myra uses Wizard Grouper's magic wand to turn every town into Pirate Town! Will Molly and Gil be able to restore Holiday Land back to normal?

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep606
programme.desc: Winter Sports Chompetition! - Gil and Bubble Puppy are competing in the Winter Sports Chompetition--a competition for athletes and their dogs! Will they be able to stop reigning champs Coldsnap and his dog Mr. Husky from cheating to win the gold?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep306
programme.desc: The Camping Holiday - Peppa and her family are on holiday in their trailer van. They decide to go to Duck Land, a special park where they can see the ducks in the river, and are surprised when they learn that their van can convert into a boat!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep307
programme.desc: Compost - Peppa and George take a bin of vegetable peelings to Grandpa Pig's compost heap. Worms inside the bin turn the peelings into compost, which Granny and Grandpa use to help their plants grow.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep602
programme.desc: Desert Island - When a fishing trip goes wrong, leaving Grandpa Pig, Granddad Dog, and Grampy Rabbit stranded on a desert island, Captain Daddy Dog is the only one able to save them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep603
programme.desc: Perfume - After smelling Granny Pig's perfume de lavender, Peppa experiments with the flowers in the garden to create her own special smell.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep153
programme.desc: Smile Day - When Froga discovers that someone has scribbled a horrible frowny face one of her pumpkins in her garden, Anna and her are quite upset - especially since today is smile day!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep154
programme.desc: No Panic ! - Christopher needs to warn Froga to protect her strawberries since he ears a thunderstorm coming! It turns out, the noise of thunder comes from Bubu's new invention: the weather machine!

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep115
programme.desc: The Fuchsia Ocean - Chemical sprays are making the countryside rosy! The Barbapapas' build an aviary to protect sick birds.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep121
programme.desc: Greedyguts / Where is Bali? - A goat has escaped from the mountain and is coming to wreak havoc, devouring everything in its path! // Bali is nowhere to be found, and the Barbapapa deploy all their imagination to look for her. They have no idea that a nice surprise awaits them!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S02 Ep202
programme.desc: Hide and Seek with Blue - Josh, Blue, and all our friends are playing Hide and Seek, and Blue knows the BEST hiding spot! As we play Blue's Clues to figure out the best place to hide, we search for our hiding friends and play Snail and Seek with Magenta and Blue.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S03 Ep301
programme.desc: The Hundred Mile Race - Blaze visits VelocityVille to compete with his new racecar pals (Danica Patrick, Jimmie Johnson, Kasey Kahne) in the longest race ever: the Hundred Mile Race! But Crusher is racing too, and he’ll do anything to win.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep318
programme.desc: Pups in a Jam / Pups Save a Windsurfing Pig - It’s the annual Jamboree Jamfest, but all of the fruit is carried off by ants! It's up to the pups to lure the ants to safety. // Zuma is on a wacky water rescue after Cornelius the pig goes for a ride on a windsurfing board.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep319
programme.desc: Pups Get Growing / Pups Save a Space Toy - Fertilizer causes Yumi’s crops to sprout huge veggies, so Ryder and the Paw Patrol must corral the stampeding produce! // The Paw Patrol draws a message on Farmer Al’s field to tell the space aliens the pups found their lost toy!

programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Deep Blue Boo Boo / Stuck Together - When the Robotons dump a load of plastic in the Crystal Lake, a raging lake monster appears and Rammy has to conquer his fear of water to save the day! // When Lola and Sir Steel become stuck together, they have no choice but to work as a team!

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep202
programme.desc: Fizzy Frenzy - Bobbi's super fizzy drink ends up creating bubbly burpy havoc across Platinum City!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Paddington Makes a Scrapbook / Paddington Digs a Tunnel to Peru - Paddington decides to make a scrapbook of memories and tries to include all his friends to show Aunt Lucy. // Paddington decides to dig a Tunnel through the centre of the earth to Peru but ends up in Mr. Curry's green house.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Paddington and The Meteor Shower / Paddington and The Talent Show - Paddington has three chances to take a photo of a meteor shower using Mr. Gruber's antique camera. // Paddington enters Mr. Brown into the Townhall talent contest. However, Mr. Brown gets stage fright and Paddington must come to the rescue.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep513
programme.desc: The Flying Vet - Doctor Hamster is rushed off her feet when nearly all the animals need her help on the same day.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep514
programme.desc: Kylie Kangeroo - Peppa and George meet Kylie Kangaroo and her brother Joey. Peppa shows Kylie how to jump up and down in muddy puddles, but who can jump the highest?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep515
programme.desc: Captain Daddy Dog - Mummy Dog and Danny are very excited! Captain Daddy Dog is home from the sea, and he's bearing gifts! What can they be?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep516
programme.desc: Grampy Rabbit's Dinosaur Park - To celebrate Freddy Fox's birthday, the children go on a trip to a Dinosaur Park. With Grampy Rabbit as their leader, they follow dinosaur footprints to find Freddy's birthday treat.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep610
programme.desc: Mystery On The Guppy Express! - When Oona's Bubble Kitty goes missing aboard the Guppy Express, Detective Nonny steps in to help. Knowing the cat must be on board, they race to find her before the train reaches its next stop--and Bubble Kitty may be lost for good!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Sad Day with Blue - Blue's feeling sad, so we play Blue's Clues to figure out why. Along the way to figuring out Blue's Clues, we help our Felt Friends and Blues' friends from her school deal with emotions and feelings in different situations.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Laugh with Blue - Josh is being silly but still can't get Blue to laugh! We play Blue's Clues to figure out what will make Blue laugh. While we look for clues we find patterns with a goofy gopher and locate all the mixed-up things in Silly Town.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S05 Ep513
programme.desc: The Big Balloon Rescue - All of Axle City is enjoying the Balloon Fair - until Crusher and Pickle get stuck on a runaway hot-air balloon! Now it's up to Blaze and AJ to rescue their high-flying friends... before they crash into the Slime Volcano!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep103
programme.desc: To The Lighthouse / The Golden Giant - When a storm blows out the lighthouse light, Santi and crew hurry to guide Mami and Abuelo back from sea. // When Enrique awakens a giant, Santi and crew must find a way to save the day.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep118
programme.desc: William Manta: News Fish - While visiting Rayna at work, William learns what it takes to become a top-notch TV reporter

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep907
programme.desc: Pups Save the Tooth Fairy / Pups Solve the Mystery of the Missing Art - Julius loses his tooth and has a dream that the Paw Patrol saves a bumbling Tooth Fairy. // When all the paintings mysteriously disappear from the Art Museum festival, the PAW Patrol must solve the Missing Art Mystery and return all the paintings.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Paddington Plans a Party / Paddington Learns the Violin - Mr Brown has forgotten to get Mrs Brown a Birthday present, Paddington decides to hold a surprise party. // Judy does not like Violin lessons so hides from Ms Potts. Paddington takes up the challenge. Watch out ears!

programme.desc: The Rainbow - Peppa and her family spot a rainbow when they go for a drive.

programme.desc: Pedro's Cough - Pedro gets a contagious cough at daycare and other children soon catch it. When it's time to go the grown-ups catch it too, including Madame Gazelle. Doctor Brown Bear gives them terrible-tasting medicine, but who will look after him when he is sick?

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep145

programme.desc: Fabric - Kit and Pup are dressing up and creating their own fashion show. But what will they do when Pup's fabric trousers rip on the catwalk?

programme.desc: Banana - Dee encourages a friend to say banana and we go on a whirlwind word adventure.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents S07 Ep712
programme.desc: Play Date...of Doom / Teacher's Pet - Foop is back and there to try and destroy his arch enemy Poof again, and it's up to Timmy and Poof to thwart his evil plan. // When Timmy wishes he were the teacher's pet, Poof literally grants his wish and turns him into a guinea pig.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents S07 Ep713
programme.desc: Manic Mom-Day / Crocker of Gold - When Timmy gripes that being Mom is easier than being a kid, Wanda takes the bait and switches their brains. // Frustrated by his inability to catch fairies, Crocker turns his attention to hunting a new magical creature - leprechauns.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S10 Ep215
programme.desc: Feral Friends / Don't Wake Patrick! - A strange moon turns everyone in town into wild animals, and Sandy's the only one who can save them! // Patrick's sleepwalking, and SpongeBob can't wake him up!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep217

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep218
programme.desc: Spin the Bottle / There's a Sponge in My Soup - Plankton poses as a wish-granting genie in his latest scheme to get the secret formula. // Mr. Krabs' new Krabby soup is a hit - until some heat-loving hippies move into the soup vat!

programme.title: Landline Ep39
programme.desc: A tasty sampler of stories from the land - covering food, agriculture, crops, climate, business and innovation - as we meet the fascinating people who make our rural and regional communities unique. Presented by Pip Courtney.

programme.title: ABC News Ep91
programme.desc: Miriam Corowa presents the latest from ABC News, following today's top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, expert analysis and all the updated news, sport, weather and information you need.

programme.title: The Breakfast Couch Ep39
programme.desc: Join Michael Rowland, Lisa Millar and the team for some of the best conversations as we hear from some of the most informed and entertaining guests who have appeared on News Breakfast.

programme.title: ABC News Ep91
programme.desc: Miriam Corowa presents the latest from ABC News, following today's top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, expert analysis and all the updated news, sport, weather and information you need.

programme.title: Q+A Highlights Ep37
programme.desc: Sr. 15 - Giving all Australians a voice, Q+A gets to the heart of the issues that matter. Stan Grant drives the conversation with a panel of guests as the audience and general public get to ask the questions to key decision-makers.

programme.title: AFLW - Semi Finals Ep66
programme.desc: Do-or-die finals footy with the season on the line. Semi Finals in the AFLW. Teams To be confirmed.

programme.title: ABC National News Ep46
programme.desc: Live across Australia, the latest from ABC News, following today's top stories and live coverage of events as they unfold. Plus comprehensive analysis, context and original investigations from ABC reporters around the world.

programme.title: Anh's Brush With Fame - Li Cunxin Ep8
programme.desc: Sr. 6 - 'Mao's Last Dancer' Li Cunxin shares his incredible journey from extreme poverty in communist China to principal dancer on the world ballet stage. Can Anh capture his poise and humility?

programme.title: Gardening Australia Ep32
programme.desc: Sr. 33 - Inspiring, entertaining and full of practical advice, join Costa Georgiadis and the team as they unearth gardening ideas, meet avid gardeners and look at some of the most inspiring gardens from across the country.

programme.title: Grand Designs Australia - Cottage Point House Ep8
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Self employed entrepreneur Drew builds a Balinese resort-style mansion in leafy Cottage Point. Not one to do things by halves, his mansion will have Balinese Pavilions, an infinity pool and a nightclub.

programme.title: Escape From The City - Adelaide Hills SA: The Steeles Ep13
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - The lure of South Australia and its fresh local produce has attracted Melbourne couple Gab and Matt. They want to find a house in the Adelaide Hills where they can open their cheese cave business.

programme.title: Australian Story - A Star Is Torn - Tim Minchin Ep27
programme.desc: After his dazzling career comes unstuck, musician, actor and provocateur Tim Minchin reassesses his comedy, questions the dangerous allure of fame, and finds home is where the heart is.

programme.title: Four Corners Ep38
programme.desc: ABC's multi-award winning investigative current affairs documentary series Four Corners is globally recognised for excellence in journalism and film-making, amassing 62 Walkley Awards and an array of international awards.

programme.title: Kurt Fearnley's One Plus One - Nornie Bero Ep10
programme.desc: Nornie Bero has a passion for food. The Torres Strait Islander chef wants people to embrace Indigenous ingredients and seasonal, local produce. Nornie tells how her childhood on the islands has influenced her business.

programme.title: ABC News Overnight Ep91
programme.desc: The final word on the day's top stories, with the latest news and updated information from Australia's most trusted source of independent news.

programme.title: Media Watch Ep38
programme.desc: Paul Barry turns the spotlight onto those who 'make the news': the reporters, online editors, producers, camera operators and photographers, plus PR consultants, media agencies, spin-doctors, lobbyists and social influencers.

programme.title: The World This Week Ep43
programme.desc: Beverley O'Connor presents the week's main international news, as reported by ABC News correspondents deployed in Bangkok, Beirut, Istanbul, Jakarta, Jerusalem, London, New Delhi, Port Moresby, Taipei, Tokyo and Washington.

programme.title: ABC News Regional Ep43
programme.desc: Take a closer look at what's making headlines in regional and rural Australia. ABC News reporters across the country uncover the news and unique stories about what's going on outside the big cities. Presented by Amy Culpitt.

programme.title: Inside Central Station Ep5
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - As we mark the anniversary of Australia's worst train disaster, we meet the team who use state-of-the-art technology to keep the network safe. A violent machete attack at a suburban station leaves ROC security baffled.

programme.title: Home And Away Ep193
programme.desc: Sr. 33 - Justin and Leah celebrate the returned money, though John has other ideas. Bella is left devastated by Nikau's misguided attempts to make things right. Nikau's discharge from hospital creates tension at home.

programme.title: Home And Away Ep194
programme.desc: Sr. 33 - Mackenzie makes her feelings towards Logan known. Dean 1st steps to rehabilitation create a hurdle for him and Ziggy. Will Bella and Nikau find their way back together? Alf fights for Martha's attention.

programme.title: Home And Away Ep195
programme.desc: Sr. 33 - Martha realises what Alf is fishing for. Logan discovers who is more stubborn Dean or Mackenzie. Tori and Christian discover if mixing wine and wedding shopping is a good idea.

programme.title: Home And Away Ep196
programme.desc: Sr. 33 - Ryder and Chloe pull off the unexpected. Justin pivots into expanding his business. Ziggy oversteps the line with Mackenzie.

programme.title: Home And Away Ep197
programme.desc: Sr. 33 - Chloe and Ryder get through a long day. Mackenzie reads into signals. Tori must deal with Logan again.

programme.title: DocFilm
programme.desc: Dreamchaser - Overcoming Boundaries. Paraplegic racing wheelchair racer Alhassane Baldé and blind judoka Shugaa Nashwan are the two athletes portrayed in this film. Both grew up in Germany. Alhassane is training in the hopes of competing in his fourth Paralympics, while for Shugaa, Tokyo would be his first Paralympic Games. But before Shugaa's "lifelong dream" can come true, the judoka faces an additional challenge: On a trip to war-torn Yemen, he witnesses first-hand the humanitarian catastrophe in his war-torn homeland. Wheelchair racer Alhassane has not been back to his native Guinea for 17 years, where he nearly lost his life at birth. The paraplegic child grew up in Germany with adoptive parents. "If I had stayed in Guinea, I wouldn't have lived to be five," says the 35-year-old. After many months of training and preparation, what happens to these two athletes’ dreams to reach Tokyo? How do they cope with success and failure, after having struggled and achieved so much?

programme.title: LIVE: UFC 281: Adesanya vs. Pereira
programme.desc: Prelims - “The Last Stylebender” will take over the Big Apple again on Saturday, November 12, as Israel Adesanyadefends his middleweight title againt Brazilian knockout artist Alex Pereira in the main event of UFC 281 atMadison Square Garden in New York City.Fighting in “The World’s Most Famous Arena” for the first time since a Performance of the Night knockout ofDerek Brunson in 2018, Adesanya will now put his undisputed 185-pound title on the line for the sixth timeagainst Pereira, who is unbeaten in three UFC bouts, including a July finish of Sean Strickland, and owns apair of kickboxing victories over Adesanya. Plus, the championship doubleheader kicks off in the strawweightdivision, as surging two-time champion Carla Esparza defends her crown against China’s Zhang Weili, who islooking to regain the 115-pound title, and lightweight action heroes Dustin Poirier and Michael Chandler squareoff in what promises to be a Fight of the Year candidate
